Detailed Description

The ParametersView class provides a tabbed view for nodes parameters.

ParametersView provides a page for each of the parts of a node. The tab bar shows the node part name and the tab area shows the part parameters list.

The tab area containes a FieldContainerWidget.

See also:
FieldContainerWidget

QStringList ParametersView::ContainerNodeParts ( SoBaseKit *  coinNode  )  [private]

Returns the names of the parts of the coinNode that the view shows.

If the coinNode is not a container node, return a empty list.

void ParametersView::valueModificated ( const QStringList &  oldValuesList,
SoBaseKit *  coinNode,
QString  containerName 
) [signal]

Emmits a signal when a parameters of the view is modified.

The modified paramenters is a coinNode containerName part name paramenter.

The part parameters previous values are saved in oldValuesList.
